title: North Wilmington
headline:
Your best health,
here in North Wilmington
intro: If you don’t already have a Primary Care Provider, it’s important to make an appointment and find an expert you trust to guide your health and refer you to specialty care if needed.

locationsIntro.title: North Wilmington
locationsIntro.content: ChristianaCare Primary Care locations offer a variety comprehensive medical care for adults and children, with three convenient practices for our neighbors in the North Wilmington area. Many locations offer appointments by video, by phone or in-office. Call for details.
locationsIntro.notice:
* Claymont will be relocating to 3565 Philadelphia Pike, Claymont, DE 19703
Expected to open 2/8/2021
